metadata.title: USN-5524-1 -- HarfBuzz vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that HarfBuzz incorrectly handled certain glyph sizes. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause HarfBuzz to crash, resulting in a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5524-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  gir1.2-harfbuzz-0.0 - 2.7.4-1ubuntu3.1 libharfbuzz-gobject0 - 2.7.4-1ubuntu3.1 libharfbuzz-dev - 2.7.4-1ubuntu3.1 libharfbuzz-icu0 - 2.7.4-1ubuntu3.1 libharfbuzz0b - 2.7.4-1ubuntu3.1 libharfbuzz-bin - 2.7.4-1ubuntu3.1 libharfbuzz-doc - 2.7.4-1ubuntu3.1 No subscription required
